subdefinitions.definition: To load (a vessel ) with coal or fuel oil for the engine .
To take a load of coal or fuel oil for its engine.
To steal bunker fuel by illicitly siphoning it off.

definitions.definition: To hit (a golf ball ) into a bunker ; ( chiefly passive voice ) to place (a golfer ) in the position of having a golf ball in a bunker.

subdefinitions.definition: To place (someone) in a position that is difficult to get out of ; to hinder .

definitions.definition: To fire constantly at (an opponent hiding behind an obstacle ), trapping them and preventing them from firing at other players ; also, to eliminate (an opponent behind an obstacle) by rushing to the position and firing at extremely close range as the player becomes exposed .
Often followed by down : to take shelter in a bunker or other place .

secondary_definitions: ( transitive , golf ) To hit (a golf ball ) into a bunker ; ( chiefly passive voice ) to place (a golfer ) in the position of having a golf ball in a bunker.

( transitive , paintball ) To fire constantly at (an opponent hiding behind an obstacle ), trapping them and preventing them from firing at other players ; also, to eliminate (an opponent behind an obstacle) by rushing to the position and firing at extremely close range as the player becomes exposed .
( intransitive ) Often followed by down : to take shelter in a bunker or other place .
